<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeExpression"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeExpression

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNodeGroupBase](class_visualshadernodegroupbase.md) **<** [VisualShaderNodeResizableBase](class_visualshadernoderesizablebase.md) **<** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

**Inherited By:** [VisualShaderNodeGlobalExpression](class_visualshadernodeglobalexpression.md)

A custom visual shader graph expression written in Redot Shading Language.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Custom Redot Shading Language expression, with a custom number of input and output ports.

The provided code is directly injected into the graph's matching shader function (``vertex``, ``fragment``, or ``light``), so it cannot be used to declare functions, varyings, uniforms, or global constants. See [VisualShaderNodeGlobalExpression](class_visualshadernodeglobalexpression.md) for such global definitions.

## Property Descriptions

<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeExpression_property_expression"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](class_string.md) **expression** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#class_VisualShaderNodeExpression_property_expression)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_expression**\ (\ value\: [String](class_string.md)\ )
- [String](class_string.md) **get_expression**\ (\ )

An expression in Redot Shading Language, which will be injected at the start of the graph's matching shader function (``vertex``, ``fragment``, or ``light``), and thus cannot be used to declare functions, varyings, uniforms, or global constants.
